snippet.name: EventHandler
snippet.starttext: <!----------------------------------------------------------------------- Author : $${Author} Date : $${DATE} Description : $${Description} Modification History: -----------------------------------------------------------------------> <cfcomponent name="$${Handler Name}" hint="$${Hint}" extends="coldbox.system.eventhandler"> <!--- ************************************************************* ---> <cffunction name="init" access="public" returntype="Any" output="false"> <cfset super.init()> <cfreturn this> </cffunction> <!--- ************************************************************* ---> <cffunction name="doSomething" access="public" returntype="Void" output="false"> </cffunction> <!--- ************************************************************* ---> <cffunction name="dspSomething" access="public" returntype="Void" output="false"> </cffunction> <!--- ************************************************************* ---> <cffunction name="myPrivateFunction" access="private" returntype="Void" output="false"> </cffunction> </cfcomponent>
